effect:

name: Grenouille du Gr'ce
effect: React: Tack before performing an action, to move to an adjacent Sea. React: Tack when paying an Influence cost to produce 1 Influence.

name: Grousin' George

name: Guy McCormick
effect: Start: Trade Sea Heroic … Swordsman +2 (Guy inflicts 2 extra Hits during Boarding Attacks) Act: Once per turn, while you have three or more other Explorer Crew on your Ship, you may get an Item Adventure or Artifact Adventure from your deck, show it to your opponents, and put it in your hand. name: Hammocks
effect:
Ship Attachment Unique The Ship's Crew Maximum is increased by 2.

name: Hired Swordsman
effect:

effect: Target a Ship. That Ship suffers 1 Hit. The gunners heard the creaking, looked up, and before they could do anything they were knee deep in water.

Loyal Act: Tack to inflict 1 Hit on an opposing Ship in your Sea.

effect:

effect:
Heroic

effect: "This is no place for a lady at this time of night, ma'am. There are all sorts of unsavory characters about. Me f'r instance."

name: Julius Caligari
effect:
Villainous
